name: Bumpy Bee
description:
Trying to get back into this awesome hobby.

Revived this old game I made way back then. :) 

It's pretty straight forward.

1. Click to fly

2. Avoid spikes

3. Get highest score!

Hope ya'll enjoy!

Special thanks to Kenney, Heartbeast, Shaun Spalding and other tutorials that helped me with this game.
